contest-event.event-date:
March 26, 1967 D North Eastern Area (Championship Section)
Yorkshire Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Area yorkshire-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Yorkshire
Championship
Festival Music
Leeds Town Hall, Leeds, West Yorkshire, England, UK After 1966, when the North Eastern Area was not run, but was replaced by the Yorkshire Brass Band Championships, both contests were run in 1967, with bands from this contest qualifying for the finals. The alternative Yorkshire area contest was held on 11th March at St. George's Hall, Bradford.
Six bands competed, after Carlton Main withdrew.
Dec. 12, 2011, 4:14 p.m. Jan. 24, 2018, 9:15 p.m.
1 Grimethorpe Colliery Band George Thompson
2 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Walter B. Hargreaves
3 Black Dyke Band Roy Newsome
Unknown Result Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Trevor Walmsley
